column4: [URGENT]I have installed ubuntu 12.04 first and I was in need of windows xp for some stuff. and I installed it in another partition. it is working properly. now I'm trying to install ubuntu in a separate partition thro usb creator. but when I click on "Install Ubuntu" it says that I cannot find any OS in my system. and when proceed further it doesn't show the partition present in the system. it just appears the whole hard drive?? i
why are you trying to install ubuntu - you have already installed ubuntu
when we install XP in a system it eats up everything.. the ubuntu partition is still there but no bootloader to access it
ok - so you don't need to re-install, you just need to re-apply grub
